title: Weird FPS drop
body:
Hey, guys! I purchased an $1,100 gaming laptop called "Omen" by HP. The upgraded one. Every game of league I run around 200+ FPS on ultra everything, randomly throughout the game it oddly drops to 30 fps, that's even on low settings.

The only way I can fix it, Is unplugging, the laptop and plugging It right back in. Does anyone have any way or suggestion to keep from  random fps drop?

No computer viruses, basically brand new, no clue why this is going on. All responses are welcome!

replies.body:
It sounds like this may be an issue with your Windows Power Settings. I recommend ensuring you've set your power plan to *High Performance* with [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq6)

Let me know if this resolved your issue~

In that case, it sounds like League is having a hard time working with your Display driver. Check out our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for a list of steps that should assist you in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps helped.

Press Ctrl + Shift + Esc (Or how you know to get to task bar) And anything that says Game Bar end task.

Then follow these steps

1) Go to your Xbox app. You can search it on the bottom left

2) Go to settings

3) Click on Game DVR (Under settings)

4) Turn off Record games

This worked for me, but It might not be your issue! Hope it helps!!
Thanks for the reply man! I'll give this a shot!
